attributes.action: Postumately reinstate Diana, Princess of Wales to HRH
attributes.additional_details:
History is the evidence and her children are part of her legacy. As a future Kings mother her HRH should never have been taken away. I think it about time the monarchy acknowledged this especially in light of the next King moving on and marrying again.

I, like so many millions did not agree with the denouncing at the time. 20 years later and prior to the anniversary of her death, Diana, Princess of Wales deserves to have her HRH reinstated.
attributes.background: As the mother of the future King, Diana Princess of Wales should never have had here HRH title taken away. It's nearly 20 years since she passed. Her HRH should be reinstated for her boys, history, the Crown and for the wonderful work she did that lives on through the future King and his brother
